title: Monthly Reports Received
description: Total number of reports received through official and community channels each month.
interpretationHint: Increases may reflect raised awareness or improved reporting access.
warningText: Data does not represent all cases; underreporting is common.

title: Daily Hotline Calls
description: Number of calls made to the national support hotline each day.
interpretationHint: Higher call volume may indicate increased outreach or community awareness.
warningText: Not all callers disclose the full nature of their concerns.

title: Weekly Case Resolutions
description: Cases where individuals received meaningful assistance or next-step guidance.
interpretationHint: Higher resolution numbers can reflect improved coordination among services.
warningText: Resolution does not imply long-term outcome.

title: Shelter Capacity Usage
description: Percentage of available shelter spaces currently in use.
interpretationHint: Higher percentages may indicate increased demand for safe accommodation.
warningText: Capacity varies by region and may change quickly.

title: Online Support Chat Volume
description: Number of online chat sessions initiated on the digital support platform.
interpretationHint: Online services may be preferred for privacy or accessibility.
warningText: Chat sessions represent initial contacts, not full support cases.

title: Monthly Legal Information Inquiries
description: Requests for legal guidance or next-step information.
interpretationHint: Higher numbers may reflect community awareness of available rights.
warningText: Inquiries do not represent formal legal action.

title: Community Workshop Attendance
description: Participation in community education and awareness events.
interpretationHint: Higher attendance may indicate community readiness for shared learning.
warningText: Some workshops have limited space, affecting attendance numbers.

title: Follow-Up Support Completed
description: Support follow-ups completed by trained community responders.
interpretationHint: Completed follow-ups can reflect engagement and continuity of care.
warningText: Follow-up numbers vary depending on available personnel.

title: Resource Page Clicks
description: Number of views on online educational and support resources.
interpretationHint: Increased clicks can reflect growing interest in support information.
warningText: Clicks do not measure completion or understanding.

title: Regional Support Requests
description: Number of support requests received from different regions.
interpretationHint: Regional variations may reflect population differences and resource availability.
warningText: Requests do not reflect all community needs.

title: Community Outreach Events
description: Number of awareness and support-focused outreach events held in communities.
interpretationHint: An upward trend may reflect growing engagement.

title: Survivor Support Sessions
description: One-on-one or group support sessions delivered each month.
interpretationHint: Consistent numbers may reflect good resource availability.

title: Legal Aid Requests
description: Monthly number of survivors requesting legal support or guidance.
interpretationHint: Higher numbers may indicate increased awareness of legal rights.

title: Hotline Daily Calls
description: Number of calls handled by the GBV hotline.
interpretationHint: Spikes may correlate with awareness campaigns or external events.

title: Digital Reports Received
description: Reports submitted through online platforms.
interpretationHint: Helps track the usage of online channels.

title: Community Training Sessions
description: Workshops conducted to educate communities on safety and rights.
interpretationHint: More sessions may reflect community engagement.

title: Awareness Campaign Reach
description: Estimated number of individuals reached through awareness initiatives.
interpretationHint: Higher reach often correlates with social media engagement.

title: Support Group Sessions
description: Facilitated support groups focusing on healing and recovery.
interpretationHint: Consistent attendance can indicate trust in the service.

title: Youth Program Participation
description: Participation in youth awareness programs.
interpretationHint: Useful for tracking early prevention

title: Mental Health Referrals
description: Referrals made to counselling and mental health services.
interpretationHint: Spikes may reflect seasonal or external stress factors.

title: Case Follow-Ups Completed
description: Number of case follow-ups completed successfully.
interpretationHint: Helps measure service consistency.

title: Transport Assistance Requests
description: Requests for safe transport to shelters or services.
interpretationHint: Higher requests may reflect increased service awareness.

title: Mobile App Active Users
description: Active users of the GBV support mobile app.
interpretationHint: Reflects platform adoption.

title: Women Safe Spaces Attendance
description: Visitors attending safe community spaces for women.
interpretationHint: Higher attendance may reflect trust and accessibility.

title: School Awareness Sessions
description: GBV awareness and education sessions delivered in schools.
interpretationHint: School engagement helps build early awareness.

title: Anonymous Chat Sessions
description: Conversations handled through anonymous chat support.
interpretationHint: A reliable indicator of online support usage.

title: Educational Resource Downloads
description: Digital educational materials downloaded by users.
interpretationHint: Higher downloads indicate active learning.

title: Referrals to Shelters
description: Requests for immediate or short-term shelter support.
interpretationHint: Shows how many individuals seek safe spaces.

title: Volunteer Signups
description: Individuals registering to volunteer for community support programs.
interpretationHint: A healthy volunteer base strengthens local support systems.

title: Social Media Engagement
description: Interactions with awareness content on social platforms.
interpretationHint: Higher engagement helps spread key messages.
